oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Crayon print of Nancy Shepherd Martin
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Crayon print of Nancy Shepherd Martin, born in Albemarle, N. C. in 1812. She was married to John Lemuel Martin. Her grandson, John Taylor, served in the Confederate Army and was wounded at Shiloh. According to family lore, her granddaughter, Nancy Taylor Kinzer, went to Shiloh to pick up her wounded brother and brought him back home to Milan, Tenn., on a flatbed train.
